title: Russell Cave National Monument: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids              For Kids      Junior Ranger ProgramA Junior Ranger Program is available for children up to twelve years old.  Complete the junior ranger activities during your visit and receive an official Russell Cave Junior Ranger badge and certificate from a Park Ranger.Museum The Museum area contains information about the history of the cave and replicas of artifacts that were found in the cave excavations.  Learn about the people who lived in the Cave Shelter 9000 years ago.Videos There are several movies that are available to watch during your visit.  These movies describe the lifeways of the people who lived at Russell Cave and the cave system itself.
